description: Fall is the best time of the year. And what better way to celebrate the best season than by drinking a Pumpkin&nbsp;Daiquiri? This rum cocktail will warm you up and give you that cozy feeling while being so delicious at the same time.
name: Pumpkin Daiquiri

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients except for the orange twist in a cocktail shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients except for the orange twist in a cocktail shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake hard and strain into a glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake hard and strain into a glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with the orange twist, and serve immediately!
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with the orange twist, and serve immediately!
